Initially, the man is on a ramp in the center-left, with a cornfield in the middle ground to the left and a combine harvester in the middle ground to the right. A railroad crossing sign occupies the foreground at the center-left. The camera pans right, following the man as he rides up the ramp and performs a flip, landing on a large container that becomes the central element. The camera continues to pan right and lowers to the subject's level, keeping the man centered as he rides away on the final car.
